T02TD2562E:24b-0: @24b * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2562E:24b-1: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rnal 'byor bas byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa ni rang gi yi dam gang yin par bsams la /
T02TD2562E:24b-2: de'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jam glas pa cig bsgom /
T02TD2562E:24b-3: de'i lte ba la aa dkar po cig bsams la de la dmigs pa gtad nge spros bral du bsgom mo //
T02TD2562E:24b-4: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i man dang //
T02TD2562E:24b-5: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
